<div align="center">

# iSTFTNet <!-- omit in toc -->
[![ColabBadge]][notebook]
[![PaperBadge]][paper]  

</div>

Unofficial implementation of iSTFTNet, light-weight HiFi-GAN vocoder with iSTFT.  

<!-- Auto-generated by "Markdown All in One" extension -->

## Demo
Samples or Link to [demo page].  

## Usage
### Install

```bash
# pip install "torch==1.13.1" -q      # Based on your environment (validated with 1.13.1)
# pip install "torchaudio==0.13.1" -q # Based on your environment
pip install git+https://github.com/tarepan/iSTFTNet
```

### Train
Jump to ☞ [![ColabBadge]][notebook], then Run. That's all!  

For arguments, check [./istftnet/config.py](https://github.com/tarepan/iSTFTNet/blob/main/istftnet/config.py).  
For dataset, check [`speechcorpusy`](https://github.com/tarepan/speechcorpusy).  

### Inference
Both CLI and Python supported.  
For detail, jump to ☞ [![ColabBadge]][notebook] and check it.
